cluster_classes.class_description: Methods used to inspect materials for defects without causing damage, including radiographic, ultrasonic, visual, and magnetic particle testing.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Methods in the FOCUS chunk for detecting defects.

members.entity_description: A non-destructive testing method using X-rays or gamma rays to view the internal structure of a component.
An ultrasonic testing method using shear waves to detect flaws in materials.
A non-destructive testing method using high-frequency sound waves to detect internal flaws.
A non-destructive testing method involving the visual examination of a component.
A non-destructive testing method using fluorescent particles to detect surface and near-surface defects.

cluster_classes.class_description: Reference handbooks, manuals, and publications providing technical information on metals, corrosion, failure analysis, and material behavior for engineering applications.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: ASM Metals Handbook volumes cover properties, corrosion, and failure analysis.

members.entity_description: Reference for properties and selection of iron, steels, and high-performance alloys.
Reference for corrosion in petroleum refining and petrochemical operations.
Reference for failure analysis and prevention.
Manual on corrosion in the petrochemical industry.
Study on thermo-mechanical fatigue behavior of materials.

cluster_classes.class_description: Standards and guidelines for corrosion control, risk-based inspection, and safe operation in industrial settings.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Codes for calculating heater tube thickness and construction of pressure vessels.

members.entity_description: Risk-Based Inspection - Base Resource Document for risk assessment.
Guidelines for the safe operation of hydrofluoric acid alkylation units.
Guidelines for corrosion control in hydroprocessing reactor effluent air cooler systems.
Guidelines for avoiding environmental cracking in amine units.

cluster_classes.class_description: Standards and reports detailing fitness-for-service evaluation procedures and integrity assessment for pressure vessels, tanks, and piping.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Codes for calculating heater tube thickness and construction of pressure vessels.

members.entity_description: Fitness-For-Service evaluation procedures for operating pressure vessels, tanks, and piping.
Fitness-For-Service standard for assessing the integrity of equipment.

cluster_classes.class_description: Comprehensive standards and codes for construction, inspection, integrity assessment, and safe operation of equipment and structures, including pressure vessels.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Codes for calculating heater tube thickness and construction of pressure vessels.

cluster_classes.class_description: Standards and codes specifically for the construction, inspection, and operation of pressure vessels.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Codes for calculating heater tube thickness and construction of pressure vessels.

members.entity_description: Pressure Vessel Inspection Code for calculating heater tube thickness in petroleum refineries.

members.entity_name: ASME Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code Section VIII
members.entity_description: Rules for construction of pressure vessels.
Requirements for materials and fabrication of heavy wall pressure vessels for high temperature and pressure service.
Standard for steels used in hydrogen service at elevated temperatures and pressures.

cluster_classes.class_description: Standards and codes for general engineering equipment and structures, including heat exchangers, nuclear components, and welded structures.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Codes for calculating heater tube thickness and construction of pressure vessels.

members.entity_description: Standard for Shell and Tube Heat Exchangers used in general refinery service.

members.entity_name: ASME Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code Section III
members.entity_description: Rules for construction of nuclear power plant components.

args.justification: Class_Group is already correctly set for 'Non-Destructive Testing Methods', which is distinct from the standards/reference material classes.

args.new_description: Standards and codes for the construction, inspection, integrity assessment, and safe operation of pressure vessels and related equipment.
args.justification: ClsR_63bd630e is an empty, generic class with a description overlapping entirely with ClsR_a711b454, which contains all relevant entities; merging removes redundancy and clarifies schema.
Merged class should retain the correct Class_Group for standards and reference materials.
Class_Group is already correct for 'Engineering Reference Materials', which is distinct but related to other standards classes.
Class_Group is already correct for 'Corrosion and Risk-Based Standards'.
Class_Group is already correct for 'Fitness-For-Service Standards and Reports'.
Class_Group is already correct for 'General Engineering Standards'.
